posts.post_content:
Subpar card in duels, absolutely devasting and hilarous in multplayer, especially if there are multiple players running multiple copies. In my group this was hitting 20 damage for 5 mana. And at instant speed. Yes please!
  
   
It's also fun to pretend you have one when there are multiple opponents sitting below 5 life. They'll do anything for you.

posts.post_content:
This card is a 4/5 people. 5 Damage to all players for the same cost as Lava Axe (minus the Black).  
  
It's like looking at [Terror](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terror) and then [Terminate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terminate). It gets better when you splice the other color.  
  
I'd say this card is great in any game as long as you roll with a black/red deck
